parameterdescription.para: Data, which will be passed into plugins during initialization.
Name of the plugin to load.

simplesect.para: Pointer to the loaded plugin or error if loading fails.

briefdescription.para: Loads a plugin by name and path.

parameterdescription.para: Path to directory where plugin file is located.
Name of the plugin to load.

simplesect.para: Pointer to the loaded plugin or error if loading fails.

parameterdescription.para: Name of the plugin to unload.

briefdescription.para: Loads all possible plugins in a directory.

parameterdescription.para: Path to directory where plugin files are located.

simplesect.para: Returns error, if no plugins are located in provided directory.

briefdescription.para: Returns the internal vector of loaded plugins.
Returns a mutable reference to the internal vector of loaded plugins.

simplesect.para: Mutable reference to the internal vector of loaded plugins.

briefdescription.para: Returns the internal map of loaded libraries.
Returns a mutable reference to the internal map of loaded libraries.

simplesect.para: Mutable reference to the internal map of loaded libraries.

briefdescription.para: Queries plugin interface by it's type via RTTI.

detaileddescription.para:
Essentially iterates over all loaded plugins and tries to dynamic_cast their pointer to the requested interface.
This function can be slow, especially when many plugins are loaded. Much better solution will be to query by internal plugin interface name using method query_interface
T
Interface type.
Reference to the retrieved interface or none when no such interface is loaded.

briefdescription.para: Queries plugin interface by it's internal name.

parameterdescription.para: Internal plugin interface name. See rolly::dll::plugin::name

simplesect.para: Reference to the retrieved interface or none when no such interface is loaded.

briefdescription.para: Queries plugin interface by it's unique ID (UUID).

parameterdescription.para: Internal plugin interface GUID. See rolly::dll::plugin::uuid

simplesect.para: Reference to the retrieved interface or none when no such interface is loaded.

briefdescription.para: Returns native extension for dynamically loaded libraries on this platform.

detaileddescription.para:
Returns dll, so on Linux.
Native extension without a prefix dot.
